website_summaries.verdict: Accurate laser measure device that works over a long distance and also carries a trusted brand name.
pros: Excellent collection of features, including distance measurement, area calculation, and simple mathematical calculations
Will take measurements to within 1/16 of an inch
Good collection of buttons to easily access various features
Includes a backlight to make display clear
cons: May not reach advertised 165-foot measurement in all types of working conditions

customer_reviews.title: Not as rugged as it seems
customer_reviews.text: Dropped once. Wouldn’t measure over 1.5 ft or so after that. It’s labeled as a “professional” and “rugged” unit that’s drop and shock proof but all it took was one 3 ft drop to break it. Probably misaligned the mirror that catches the laser on the bounce back.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kay

customer_reviews.title: No decimal inches!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. Unlike the Bosch GLM-80 I had, the display for inches is only in fractions. There is no option for decimal inches. The possible displays are fractional inches, feet-fractional inches, decimal feet and decimal meters. No where is this specified. I haven’t yet used it but I expect it to have good accuracy based on my GLM80 experience. However that one died after about four years of use. I suspect it was battery related. The instructions advise removing the battery if it is infrequently used. I recommend doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Onion

customer_reviews.title: Fraction numbers not readable on screen
customer_reviews.text: The fraction part of the measurement on the screen is way too small and light to read clearly. Easy to mess up the reading because of it.
customer_reviews.author: S Fl homeowner

customer_reviews.title: Pure build quality
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy at all. Product is defective. I was not able to complete any measurements. All the indicators on the screen are blinking which means it is a defective device. Also the build quality is not good. On images it looks solid however it is made of low quality plastic and the surface covered with rubber is too slow. It is worth to mention that the rubber itself is not soft enough to prevent any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Mher Sargsyan

customer_reviews.title: frustrating to use
customer_reviews.text: was accurate, almost to accurate because any twitch changes your reading, so unless you have the perfect condition, like laying it flat where you can see the front & be able to see the dot & see the screen-and push the button-worked like a charm, unfortunately, roughing in new rooms alone-never had that happen very often-may be the user but found it very hard to use effectively giving it 3 because it does work, but was a 0 for my personal use
customer_reviews.author: quality on the cheap

customer_reviews.title: Do not loan this to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work. A great time saver versus my tape measure and measuring wheel. It works exactly as advertised. It works great indoors. I wouldn't recommend if being used for a lot of outdoor measuring, but it does work outside. Do not loan out or leave out on your desk. It will disappear :)
customer_reviews.author: Mad Jack

customer_reviews.title: Suprised by the Accuracy. I think it's magic.
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised by the accuracy of this thing. For example, I just used it to measure the size of a window opening which measured 21 7/8". So I cut my wood at 22" and damn if I didn't need to shave exactly i/8 inch off. I've used it to measure the interior floor space of my house with similar accuracy. I am totally befuddled by this thing. I'm starting to trust its accuracy. I think it's magic. The fractions numbers are small, but readable.
customer_reviews.author: Conflicted Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Small and accurate but fractional part difficult to read!
customer_reviews.text: So very difficult to read fractional part. Sometimes can't tell if it's a 9 or a 7 in the fractional part. I will be returning this. Too bad everything else was done well.
customer_reviews.author: Dean_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Accurate. Simply put, great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. Very easy to use. Laser is bright and can be seen from a long distance, (72 ft in bright daylight I was able to find it and take an accurate measurement, better than my more expensive one, with some wear and tear). Doesn’t have the fiction of switching what position you are measuring from as some do ie. (front, center, or the back) of the unit. This is a fiction I don’t mind having on a unit of this price, especially given that it is simple to use and accurate and you can actually see your laser and know what you are measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Bush

customer_reviews.title: not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: its 3/16th different than any of our tapes. tried to use it to measure in 25ft TJI's and had to re cut all of them. ended up giveing up on the thing and using 2 guys and a tape. same thing with studs. 3/16th proud. One of the other dudes on the crew has one that is only 1/16th proud.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: I always buy two when I like something.
customer_reviews.text: Super accurate, easy to read and economically priced. I had the 120 ft. model (which also works great) but needed the extra range of 165 ft. This one also includes a carrying case. While it does include batteries, I installed lithium batteries instead because they last longer and reduce the risk of leakage. No reason to put dollar store batteries in a precision tool. The only improvement I could wish for is an OLED display but honestly this one works just fine. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I'm a home DIY. I don't need exacting measurements with this. I haven't even tried to test it's accuracy on a micro level. It seems to work really well when I need to measure a room or larger distance when a tape measure is a pain. Basic function is very easy to use, advanced functions aren't always intuitive, but I only use it a few times every couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: money wasted and not worth it. I have tried using several times and measurements are not correct. I have verified with my tape measure. DON"T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: rjp

customer_reviews.title: Bosch laser is an excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, accurate and well made. I opted for the 10 value memory as that makes measuring a room with multiple measurements fast and accurate. Changing units is quick and changes the saved units as well. It’s easy to carry around. I use it from measuring distance of saw blade to fence to measuring the dimensions of a gutted room to measuring house dimensions. Good tool!
customer_reviews.author: Len M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally have one
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for a long time and Amazon had the deal one day so finally bought one. Wish I have a long time ago for all my remodel projects. Made a bunch of error cuts that I could have had a second digital version to help verify. Having a blast on my first day measuring everything- even caused my parrot to go nuts chasing the laser dot.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device
customer_reviews.text: Compact and very easy to use. I like the backlit display and the math functions. Both long distance, outdoor measurements and indoor measurements have been very good. Battery life has been very good. Generally much more convienient and faster than a tape measure, but it's still good to carry a tape as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: NOT TOO HAPPY 4 STARS OVER ALL
customer_reviews.text: I WISH MFG COMPANY WILL TAKE ALL THIS GLM 165-40 LASERS AND REPROGRAM THEM WITH LARGER NUMERS ,I'M REFERRING THE FRACTION NUMBERS ONLY ! WAY TOO SMALL TO SEE , OTHER THAN THAT IT A BEAUTIFUL LASER TOOL TO HAVE, I HAD TO CARRY: PD250+ READING GLASSES TO SEE FRACTION NUMBER ENOUGH SAID. LOVE THIS TOOL ANYWAY. THANK YOU. SMO TEXAS
customer_reviews.author: SMOTEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Blind Measurement
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall is that the screen does not face you while your measuring. So you can't see the measurement if your having to measure with items against the wall. Poor design in that part. I will he ordering a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Fractions were missing on the measurements
customer_reviews.text: I caught this on sale so I grabbed it for my husband. The first time he uses it the fractions don't display. Accuracy should probably be 1 star. It's only a good value if you can use it. It's easy to read if you dont need the fractions. :/
customer_reviews.author: SCMom

customer_reviews.title: The laser does not come out of the unit straight as shown.
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received had the laser shooting out with a slight rise and to the right. It is subtle, but enough that you can't just put the unit on a surface and expect the laser to hit the object directly lined up straight in front of it. Ordered a second unit and the laser although still not straight was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Zspot

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  A real one person time saver.
customer_reviews.text: Like all technology that's new to you there is a learning curve. It makes and stores multiple measurements for you, just keep track of what they were for. My Bad. I have made daylight measurements of up to 80 feet. I can't imagine anyone with a steady enough had that could even see the dot on an object over 100 feet in the daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a replacement for an older model. This item is great. easier to carry around than a tape measure, more accurate and great for measuring long distances. This item also has a great battery life and is pretty "no frills" which I actually like. Simple to use even for the people who arent so tech savvy.
customer_reviews.author: HumanIcicle

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed
customer_reviews.text: After trying another brand found this one more intuitive to use. The fractions are hard to read for those of use with eyes starting to reach aging. :)
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Nice device
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, like it a bunch. Accurate to a gnat's butt. Little hard for my old eyes to read the small display.
customer_reviews.author: DogNDragon

customer_reviews.title: Great little measuring tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first digital measuring tool and I love it. The major drawback of this is the display. The measurements are too small to read especially the fractions on the right of the screen. I really wished that Bosch made it much bigger and easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical due to bad prior experiences with measurement tools bought online but this is well constructed and seems pretty accurate. Easy to use. It helped me tremendously in measuring the distance and the diagonal (I used Pythagorean theorem using height and width measurements) for the video projector selection. Now I am carrying it everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice measuring tool
customer_reviews.text: This is good for anyone who is even a little bit handy. Easy to get quick estimates for projects. Tested it using a measuring stick and it is pretty accurate. It comes with little targets to use if you are alone and need to perform measurements and also comes with a nice carrying case to keep it in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Luckey

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected,
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this device as a replacement for a more basic unit. Works much better than expected. Perfect for measuring interior spaces when a tape measure would be cumbersome or impractical. High ceilings or large garage spaces are no challenge. Seems to be robustly constructed and compact enough for a shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Just Kenny

customer_reviews.title: More than I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to do room measurements for placing ceiling fans and lights. I was working in a room with furniture, so I had to measure along the ceiling to get a straight line. Checked with measuring tape, and it was spot on. Tool has a lot of good features, but only a few buttons. I found myself accidentally clearing a measurement or something else while I got use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great device, but needs bigger numbers / format
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit, and VERY accurate; reading easily to the 1/16th of an inch. But, reading the fractions is tough! The whole numbers are OK. I have to take a star away for that...shouldn't have to get glasses to read this.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: The best brand and works great.
customer_reviews.text: As a real estate appraiser, I use it often. This is my second one. Bought the first one several years ago but upgraded and gave the other one to a friend. I use it for interior measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Randazzo

customer_reviews.title: Makes measuring easier and faster!
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool. Measurement is accurate. Faster! No more long tapes. Was done measuring my floors in less than 15 minutes. It has more features, haven’t figured them out. Will update as I get familiar with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My review...well....it works perfectly indoors or under conditions of lower lighting. Does not work that well outdoors on a average sunny day. That is probably the nature of all laser devices.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Used in my woods to measure between property markers where light but not bright sunlight. Worked very well. Made measuring by myself so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sumy

customer_reviews.title: Fraction dissplay too small.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a finish carpenter and I find this device to be very useful but I should have done more home work. The fractions are WAY too small and there is no reason for there to be a read out of thirty seconds....particularly when Bosch says it's only accurate plus or minus one sixteenth. In mind sight, I should have found a laser measuring device with a more legible display.
customer_reviews.author: JPW

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is great to have if you want fast and easy measurement of a room or walls. Easy to read, It has mode inches, feet, mm. It also calculate area. Battery operate. Fit in purse or packet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to read fractions of an inch
customer_reviews.text: The numbers you are measuring seem to bounce around if you are holding the item, and it's really hard to see the small fractional part of the inches.
customer_reviews.author: H. B. Co

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I work in construction on a job site and use this tool almost daily. It’s slim and fits into a safety vest well. It’s accuracy also seems to be very good, down to 1/16 of an inch. It’s also super easy to use. Would definitely recommend instead of carrying a 25’ tape measure around all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for estimator
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have tool for measuring and estimating....Great where you can't get a tape measure on the floor.... This tool is worth every penny and saves so much time....
customer_reviews.author: gramps4many

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: you get a lot of product for the little you pay. very convenient for multiple measurements and also area calculations. Easy peasy switch from decimals to fractions.
customer_reviews.author: JCF

customer_reviews.title: Limited for outside use. Great otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Is very accurate, but not useful outside in full sun since you cannot see the laser dot on the item. For outside it must be used in a low light situation. Glad I purchased it, I find it very useful.
customer_reviews.author: jimfrer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works the way I was wanting. Seems very accurate & easy to use. Could not remember the decimal conversions so got this one that measures in fractions instead of decimals like many others. Bosch is the best product hands down. You won't be disappointed purchasing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Olympic Peninsula

customer_reviews.title: Not for use outside
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t work any better than the 35 series. We use these every day. Works good inside not outside
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sogn

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to read outdoors! Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Been having it for about a year. I HATE it. Impossible to read outside because you can't see the red dot.
customer_reviews.author: Homer J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few weeks ago, and there was some confusion with the tracking number given by Amazon. However, I wrote CT Tools and they responded promptly, and with the correct number. My laser measure arrived today, and works great. It is consistently accurate to 7/32" at 3'-5". Have yet to try farther, but will tonight at work.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: Yes, you can get these with Bluetooth and all other bells and whistles, but this one is great value and do you really need all the bells and whistles? Maybe not. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: ELVEEZ

customer_reviews.title: Well built, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and well built. Easy to switch between modes and simple to use. Screen is a little small if you have bad eyesight but the whole point is a small and easily portable device.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen Cross

customer_reviews.title: Not for finish carpenters.
customer_reviews.text: Works great sometimes. 3 to 6 inches off sometimes also. Took the same measurement 4 straight times and read 6 inches long at 142 inches. Was going from wall to wall so the target isnt the problem. One bad cut on a piece of 9 inch dental crown and you lost double what you paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: kyle winston

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy accurate
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. Very convenient. Have used it to get measures for rooms and even used it outside, using a tree as a target to measure from one side of my house to another, although outside use is not recommended. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Reader

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful little tool. Accurate to 1/16”. Cool.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had laser measuring devices since the early 2000’s. Huge, expensive and originally German made now down to nearly nothing with 1/16” accuracy. A lovely little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to use and read. Accurate. Good buy--worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Violet B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale for 50 bucks and was definitely worth it. Good for ordering materials at long distances and not having to pull your tape out. Wish I would have got one sooner
customer_reviews.author: bennylog

customer_reviews.title: Missing features
customer_reviews.text: Product listing is wrong, this item does not have bluetooth!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: finally
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to get one of these. I like Bosch quality. Needed something to at least get approximate measurements when looking at bigger jobs with larger rooms. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: DCJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use. I am still learning to use it, but as a realtor, I have already used it on several occasions.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great measuring took
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work. It’s great for using outdoors and measuring things up high on the outside of buildings. It’s also great when measuring things from floor to ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Cass McGinness

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Only. Non Operable Outside
customer_reviews.text: Indoor only. Does not work outside. Not even on a cloudy day at less than 20 feet. Weak laser, no measurement outdoors
customer_reviews.author: kopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It worked properly right out of the box. I love it and it has a good distance.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquasch

customer_reviews.title: Saves time over a tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Electronic measures come in really handy when a regular tape measure just won’t work plus it saves time. I measured out to 100’ on the electronic measured and then checked it with my 100’ tape measure and it was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Guy

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but only that
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but the laser comes out at an odd angle with respect to the square edges of the case it is in
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good! But....
customer_reviews.text: Not really good for daytime, as the measurements come out inaccurate. But when nothing interferes with the laser, it is on point.
customer_reviews.author: SerGar14

customer_reviews.title: accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Installing 15 floor to ceiling frames for new screen porch system, lot's of measuring with normal tape drove me crazy. This tool saved many, many hours of measuring. Not easy to read display, that can be improved. Still worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: mITCH

customer_reviews.title: 165 foot is 50.3 metres
customer_reviews.text: Great tool and a must have I have bought 3 of it, because it makes life easier Try to wait for discounts i have bought it for about $50
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Hamada

customer_reviews.title: Typical Bosch
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. Totally trustworthy measurements. Accurate enough to cut trim molding to.
customer_reviews.author: Pr1mereviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love it..use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate .. use it all the time. Wish there was a way to adjust for the length of the device for some hard to reach positions but easy to add it manually to your measurements
customer_reviews.author: amazilla

customer_reviews.title: NO BLUETOOTH
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SOLELY for bluetooth connectivity which the comparison image clearly says that it has, however upon receipt of it and not being able to find anything regarding bluetooth and digging deeper into reviews this does not have bluetooth. Please fix your description
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bosch makes a great laser measuring device
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few minutes to get used to it but now I love it. It will take multiple measurements and aggregate the sqft amongst other things. Love the distance it shoots and it's extremely accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Willie g

customer_reviews.title: Cool new toy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for measuring room dimensions. Small, easy to use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CarGuy

customer_reviews.title: Constant Errors!!!
customer_reviews.text: This device has constant blatant measurement errors as well as error messages. Completely useless and now not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Greg W.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use... very fast to measure areas so we can get our projects figured out and started.
customer_reviews.author: D&R Lambert Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Is a very good product, i bought for my dad
customer_reviews.author: Alexis MerKder

customer_reviews.title: Ok for inside only and nothing over 40 ft.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could see it in bright areas better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle client

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than using a physical tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Limberg

customer_reviews.title: Small, lightweight and packed with features
customer_reviews.text: I finally took the dive on one of these. After lots of online research, this Bosch seems to hit the feature and price point sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: It makes taking  measurements a whole lot easier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them and one was a gift. Very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: Great tool however I would like for the light to stay on longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes work easier.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for quick, on site measurements. Not bulky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kev N.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I’m a kitchen and bath designer. I have used these Bosch laser for a few years and it has changed the game for me. Absolutely must have
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Very good laser measure
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome laser measure. Easy to use, small, compact and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: My opinion

customer_reviews.title: Bosch, They Never Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Bosch makes quality stuff. Add this one to the list.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetness

customer_reviews.title: Quick, accurate and essential tool.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. An absolute essential for anyone interior finish work. Accurate and safer than a tape measure that can potentially damage finished surfaces. One word of caution - this thing will set off the security tag alarms at big box stores. Take it out of the holster before you go in.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and consistant
customer_reviews.text: Had a unreliable Kobalt that this replaced. This is so much better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: aubieangel

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my dad, it works great and is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Gift for my husband for Christmas and we have used it a lot already.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Time saving measuring
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit by Bosch. this unit is smaller and just as great as my old one. Makes ease of measuring and figuring out lengths and square foot areas.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Kuenzel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: It's my first laser pointer tape measure and figured out how to determine length, distance, area, volume, etc very easily and highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and intuitive, wish the secondary units were bigger though. If it reads 5-5/8", the 5/8" portion is real small
customer_reviews.author: Marc Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: good enough for pro carpenter.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby at Christmas. he is a professional carpenter, and is impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: addicted2books

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for his work. It’s accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: Light and compact
customer_reviews.text: Tilt the screen a bit to see the readings better. Very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: FD Firefighter 121

customer_reviews.title: But measurements are easy and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use outdoors, even with the target cards. But measurements are easy and accurate. Works perfectly indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Terd Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good measurements, compact profile
customer_reviews.text: This device makes taking measurements much much easier, especially when doing them solo. No more rolling the 100 footer back up, rolling the wheel etc. Of course, Bosch is a brand I've always had lots of confidence in, so no great surprise there.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bellefleur

customer_reviews.title: adwfesgrhtyuhij
customer_reviews.text: Accurate to a 32nd of an inch !!!!! Amazing !!
customer_reviews.author: R. Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for hubby
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. No need for that long yellow measuring tape.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: A more limited distance in daylight
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work at full 65 ft inside, but a more limited distance in daylight. Not the rated 65 ft. in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Nice but has limits
customer_reviews.text: This is great for longer distances when you have a clear line of sight.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Bring some reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. However, you may need reading glasses to read the fractional numbers. They are so small that its hard for me at least, to make out the numbers without squinting in just the right light.
customer_reviews.author: BTownM

customer_reviews.title: What a huge help
customer_reviews.text: Works great! And can take a 5 foot fall from a step ladder
customer_reviews.author: Wood man

customer_reviews.title: What a tool!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this as a Father's Day gift and my Dad loved it. Easy to operate and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarcomeres

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Measurements!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased to find this laser measurement tool to help me in the field as I measure for garden designs.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Lyon

product_meta.title: Bosch Blaze Pro 165' Laser Distance Measure GLM165-40
product_meta.description: The Bosch Blaze Pro GLM165-40 165 Ft. Laser Measure is a fully featured yet simple-to-use tool. It provides an easy-to-read backlit display that illuminates the measurements, and it delivers distance, square footage, volume and indirect measuring functions. It has a 10-measurement storage capability. This measure has addition/subtraction functionality, so the user can add or subtract measurements. The Blaze Pro includes default real-time measurement mode, adjusting the measurement the closer to or further from the target the laser measure is. It has laser precision technology and real-time measurement mode, for instant and reliable measurements up to 165 Ft. , to size up the job in seconds. It is accurate up to 1/16 In. It fits in any pocket for easy access. Class IIA laser product, <1mw power output, 635 nm.
feature_bullets: ACCURACY: This fully featured and powerful laser measurer features long range measuring with extreme accuracy and measures distances up to 165 feet to within 1/16 inch, for professional confidence

EASY-TO-USE: Simple, easy to use one button operation starts by pressing button once to begin measuring; The GLM165 40 is compact enough to fit in any pocket; Features a backlit color display that allows measurements to be easily read, even in dark areas
CONVENIENT: Provides default real time measurement that adjusts as you move closer and farther from target, just like a tape measure, plus it has 10 measurement memory to keep track of distances

AUTO SQUARE: The Bosch GLM165 40 laser measure includes auto square function to automatically calculate square footage with the push of a button, allowing for fast and correct estimates for material sourcing
DURABLE: This robust Laser distance measure is IP54 rated to withstand tough jobsite conditions such as rain or dust, for reliable service and secure confidence
